title: Loto-Tonga Soka Centre
text: The Loto-Tonga Soka Centre is a <a href="Association%20football">football</a> facility in <a href="Nuku%CA%BBalofa">Nukuʻalofa</a>, <a href="Tonga">Tonga</a>. It was funded by <a href="FIFA">FIFA</a> through the world football body's Goal Programme and was opened in 2001. It hosted matches of the <a href="2018%20FIFA%20World%20Cup%20qualification%20%E2%80%93%20OFC%20First%20Round">first round of the OFC 2018 FIFA World Cup qualifiers.</a> The main office of the <a href="Tonga%20Football%20Association">Tonga Football Association</a> is also located within the venue. It has a capacity of 1,500 and is home to the <a href="Tonga%20national%20football%20team">Tonga national football team</a> and <a href="Veitongo%20FC">Veitongo FC</a>.
